00167       class reactor_iterator
00168        :public boost::iterator_facade< reactor_iterator,
00169                                    reactor_id, 
00170                                    boost::forward_traversal_tag,
00171                                    reactor_id > {
00172       public:
00173        reactor_iterator() {}
00174        reactor_iterator(reactor_iterator const &other)
00175          :m_iter(other.m_iter) {}
00176        explicit reactor_iterator(details::reactor_set::const_iterator const &i)
00177          :m_iter(i) {}
00178        ~reactor_iterator() {}
00179        
00180       private:
00181        friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00182 
00183        void increment() {
00184          ++m_iter;
00185        }
00186        bool equal(reactor_iterator const &other) const {
00187          return m_iter==other.m_iter;
00188        }
00189        reactor_id dereference() const {
00190          return m_iter->get();
00191        }
00192 
00193        details::reactor_set::const_iterator m_iter;
00194       }; // TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_iterator
